sentences.en: A rocket blasted a spaceman into space.
sentences.cn: 一枚火箭把一名宇航员送入太空.

sentences.en: As a gamer, he cares deeply about the difference between character classes—whether a ninja, merchant, or citizen spaceman.
sentences.cn: 作为一个游戏玩家，他很关心人物的性格分类——是忍者、商人还是平民宇航员。

sentences.en: ELLIOTT: Yeah, he came back. But he's not a goblin. He's a spaceman.
sentences.cn: 艾略特: 没错, 他回来了. 但是他不是小妖怪, 他是外星人.

sentences.en: Have you ever wanna be a spaceman?
sentences.cn: 你曾经想成为一名宇航员 吗 ?

sentences.en: Have you ever wanna be a spaceman? Have you ever wanna be a president yeah?
sentences.cn: 当个风光的太空人谁没梦过? 甚至变成“伟大的蒋总统”也是写准不会错的“梦”?

sentences.en: I want to be a spaceman.
Iris, I want to become a spaceman.
sentences.cn: 老师, 我很想成为宇航员.

sentences.en: The spaceman flew through the galaxy at the speed of light.
sentences.cn: 太空人以光速穿越银河系.

sentences.en: The spaceman was subjected to all kinds of tests before he sent up in rockets.
sentences.cn: 送上火箭之前,宇航员受到各种形式的测试.

sentences.en: The spaceman will drive his moon car around to study the moon.
sentences.cn: 宇航员将开着月球车到处考察月球.
宇航员都做些 什么 ?

words.tran_cn: 宇航员，太空飞行员；太空人

trans.tran_cn: 太空船上的飞行员，宇宙人
trans.tran_en: a man who travels into space
